Pour modifier le(s) groupe(s) dont vous.Prenez-garde de toujours être dans un g: Modifying a group disconnects all its members. To modify the group(s) to which you belong, we advise you to temporarily remove yourself from this group so as not to be disconnected each time you modify it. Make sure you are always in a group that allows you to retain access to this interface.
